page.title: 14SHOPPING IN CHIPPENHAM
page.content: {Chippenham High Street}is a busy shopping street.Most of the shops are small shops selling just one type of product.There are shoe shops,clothes shops,electrical shops newsagents,and many banks,building society offices and estate agents. Most people shop here on Friday or Saturday.Wednesday is half day closing for most of the shops. Here are some of the{prices of goods in 1985: Childrens' shoes cost about{Â£10. Colour televisions cost about{Â£200. A pint of milk costs{22 pence. A family car costs about{Â£4,000. A semi-detacted house with three bedrooms would cost about{Â£35,000. To post a letter by first class post costs{17 pence.
